programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 283
programme.desc: Kenneth frets over Deanna's broken tablet, and tensions between him and Nina remain. Celia organises a function for the Orchid Ladies' Society as part of her campaign to run for president. Julius tries to engage in father-son bonding activities with Louis, much to the latter's chagrin.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 7
programme.desc: The Orang Asli - recognised as the first people of Peninsula Malaysia. It's a diverse collection of tribes and most, with government assistance, now live in riverine villages in Taman Negara. But there are some who still follow the old hunter-gatherer ways. But such a way of life - idyllic as it may seem, does not mean they have it easy. Host Paul Foster journeys up the Tembeling River and into the primeval forest in search of just such a community from the Batek tribe.

programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces…. (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue her. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces…. (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

Will the trio listen and change or will they continue on with their mistakes? (重)Tiger, 哲伦 和菲菲是死党。小组长玲玲聪明伶俐，不喜欢三人在学业上差劲的态度。有一天，Tiger 遇见一位给他"快乐火柴"的科学家。"快乐火柴"能够给三人无限的快乐，三人要什么就有什么。可是，当火柴一熄灭，他们的欲望和理想都会消失。玲玲劝他们脚踏实地，面对现实。三人会否听她的劝告改过自新还是死不悔改呢？.

But the sight of piled up stocks and their declining motivation tells us otherwise. This is not just a shop in need of renovation, but packaging as well. (重)店主洪先生在阿裕尼二巷苦苦经营童装十几年，生意一直不好。我们发现他的店铺很小，格局普通，四面墙被铁丝网笼罩着，挂满了东西。店里店外的货品太多，整家店像个大货柜，让人却步，很难吸引人走进去。洪先生的生活不积极，每天以得过且过的态度日子。我们以小孩的角度把店铺变成一个小孩要走进去的彩色梦幻小乐园。经过装修，整间店变得明亮，服饰的摆设也时尚耀眼，店内还添了一个可爱的试衣间。.

programme.title: 古早味侦探 Old Taste Detective - EP 10

programme.title: 我们的社区饭厅 Hawkers In Our Centre - EP 1
programme.desc: From street peddlers to food masters in hawker centres, hawkers have been feeding Singaporeans for over a century. How did this humble trade become our national culture and part of our DNA? 麦士威熟食中心、纽顿熟食中心、老巴刹、东海岸人工湖熟食中心…… 新加坡的小贩中心，原本只是给国人提供粮食的场所，竟意外成了游客的天堂。对本地人来说，小贩中心也不只是用餐的地方，它们是我们社区里的饭厅。小贩中心提供负担得起的食物 – 这个概念打从小贩开始出现以来，就没有改变过。一个典型的小贩中心里，总有着琳琅满目的选择，每一种都是特色相互交融的味道。咖哩鱼头、福建炒虾面、云吞面、肉脞面，还有油鸡饭面，这些让人垂涎的美食背后，有着怎么样的故事呢？.

programme.desc: (R) Deemed as Asia's food paradise, Singapore is where one can find delicacies of all nationalities and eating is considered the second national pastime. Yet, with so many self-professed foodies and gourmands, Singapore finds many of its traditional foods and flavours vanishing. What has gone wrong? (重)新加坡是亚洲美食天堂，齐聚各国美食；新加坡人也爱吃也舍得吃，但可惜的是很多本地传统美食却因为各种原因而被遗忘，甚至消失。本集请来各路饕客、人气博客、文人和爱吃一族来探讨新加坡美食文化里究竟消失了些什么。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Dongchu is beaten up by a gang of men when he is mistaken for seducing a married woman. Xuncai witnesses the fight and tries to help Dongchu. He gets embroiled in the conflict and is brought to the police station. Yingshan is impressed with Hengkui when he manages to get Xuncai out of custody. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)东出到舞厅工作，结果被顾客的丈夫误以为是牛郎，追着东出满街打。勋才看到东出被多人围殴，尝试阻止，自己反而被打，一伙人闹上警局。真爱要求亨奎帮助勋才，亨奎本来不肯，后来因为认得英善，才故意伸出援手。勋才被释放，英善对亨奎另眼相看。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Biao Nali is a weather forecaster for SBC. She volunteers to go to Bangkok with the camera crew and assist in the TV station's open recruitment advertisement production to earn more money. At the airport, she once again runs into reporter Li Huaxin, who is a Bangkok correspondent and someone she once had a crazy crush on... (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)SBC气象预报员表娜丽为了努力赚钱，自愿跟摄影队，前往曼谷协助电视台在海外公开招募工作人员的广告制作。在机场，她再次与曾热烈地单恋过的曼谷特派员李华信记者重逢了。。。。。。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 69
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is deeply hurt by Haizhu who chased her out of the house and allowing Cui Meixi to move in. Haizhu confesses she is taking revenge on Zhiyuan for causing Jiaya's death. Zhuhao confirms that Ruli is Zhiyuan's daughter when she tells him that her daughter has a burn scar on her shoulder. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠把智媛赶出而安排崔美熙搬进家里，令智媛伤心。海珠声称是为了替嘉亚报仇。智媛向柱浩确认女儿肩上有巴印，柱浩确定如莉是智媛女儿。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 70
programme.desc: Haizhu pushes Zhuhao down the stairs when she tries to stop him from revealing to Zhiyuan that Ruli is her daughter. Haizhu is happy when she learns that Ruli is going to charge Zhiyuan for kidnapping Zhuhao. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)为了阻止柱浩告诉智媛如莉是她的女儿，无意把柱浩推下楼梯.得知如莉将要告智媛涉嫌绑架及软禁她父亲，暗地开心。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 5
programme.desc: This episode, Pornsak explores on matcha production in Uji, Japan and cultivation and harvest of tea leaves in Nangang, Taipei. He and Cui Fang also fly to Australia and South Korea respectively to learn how local farmers mix technology and nature to cultivate good quality strawberries and peaches. 在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往日本宇治一探抹茶的制作，到台北南港了解茶叶的种植和采收。Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往澳大利亚和韩国，了解当地果农如何借由科技结合自然培育出优质草莓和水蜜桃。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 15
programme.desc: Zaiyi and Shangbi pass incriminating photos of Wenshu and Wuzhou to reporter Liu Jingzhen. Jingzhen uses the photos in a television news bulletin. Wenshu's face is seen clearly, but Wuzhou's face is blurred. This leads Wenshu to suspect that Wuzhou has betrayed her. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)在伊和尚弼知道刘景真记者不畏惧权势，于是将文淑和五洲18年前干案的照片交给刘景真记者。景真果然在电视新闻上公开照片。文淑的样子看得很清楚，五洲的脸却被遮住，令文淑认为是五洲出卖她的。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Tai Hu tried all means to bring down the eatery. Meiwei went for quality instead of quantity. She invited many food reporters to try their food. Tai Hu threatened the reporters not to write anything about the eatery nor publish their advertisements, barring it from all sorts of media exposure. (PG)(重)美薇不肯原谅富贵当年所犯的错。浩伦发挥其宣传手段，终吸引食客们再度光顾小吃店，但泰虎不惜砸大钱，不断重挫小吃店。眼看众人决定放弃小吃店，泰虎竟因不甘厨艺遭父亲质疑，向小吃店发出美食‘生死战’.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Medical insurance only provides treatment coverage but not happiness. The greatest challenge for nursing homes in Japan is how to make the elderly live happily. The nursing homes in Nagoya have special services to attract the elderly. Let's follow the fixer to uncover the truth about these homes. (重)医疗保险通常只是提供治疗保障，不考虑幸福感的需求，如何让老人快乐地活下去，是日本托老所面临的最大挑战。名古屋的老人院就有奇招，贴心服务，老人家争相前来。这一集就让线人为我们揭开托老所的真实现状。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Director Shen and Zhexiong arrange to have lunch with Zaimin and Caili when they hear that the youngsters are getting along well. The quick-witted Hengshun saves the day when Zaimin is about to be exposed for getting another person to meet up with Caili at the match-making session previously. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)申在民的父亲跟哲雄原来是老朋友。两人听说采莉跟在民交往顺利，特地安排了饭局。采莉高兴，赴约前传简讯给亨顺，亨顺这才知道顶替在民相亲的事即将被揭穿了。亨顺灵机一动，再次帮在民解围。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Nali meets Huaxin at the TV station again. She suspects Huaxin is suffering from breast cancer. She worries for him as both her mother and grandmother passed away with breast cancer. Nali asks Huaxin to go for a check-up. Huaxin, a male chauvinist, feels horrified and tells Nali off. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜丽在电视台再次遇见华信，对华信感到担心，说怀疑他患上了乳腺癌，因为外婆和妈妈都因为乳腺癌去世, 让他到医院去检查一下，让大男人主义的华信感到很惊慌，并用恶言把娜丽骂走。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 71
programme.desc: Zhuhao notices Xiaochun's frightened look upon seeing Zhiyuan, so he comforts her that Zhiyuan is her grandmother and will love her. Zhuhao's words arouse Monian's suspicion. She secretly did a DNA test for Ruli and Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)柱浩看到小春害怕智媛，他安慰说智媛身为婆婆会爱她的，这番话令末年怀疑，偷偷跟如莉与智媛做亲子检测.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 72
programme.desc: Monian is happy that Zhiyuan and Ruli are not related from the DNA test report but in actuality, the report has been swapped by Wulie with a fake one. Zhiyuan found the original DNA report and is shocked that Ruli is her biological daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)看到如莉与智媛的亲子检测显示她们没亲子关系，感到安慰。其实武烈把原本的报告更换.原本的报告被智媛找到，发现如莉竟是她亲生女儿。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 8
programme.desc: With around 8 million bikes plying the streets, traffic fatalities are the main cause of death in Ho Chi Minh City. Danny Yeo stakes out at Cho Ray Hospital's emergency unit to witness the hard work and heartbreak that takes place round the clock - all due to a moment of recklessness on the roads. 越南是公路意外高发国，每年夺走8000多条人命。主持人杨君伟在胡志明市体验800万辆电单车在道路上横冲直撞的险象环生，并亲往医院急诊室，看医护人员如何分秒必争抢救车祸伤者。一时不慎，代价惨重。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 16
programme.desc: Wenshu holds a press conference to claim that she was not involved in the murder case and also announces that she will run for the position of Chief Justice. Soon after, Wenshu is attacked by a convict's father. News of her injuries overshadow the news of her suspected involvement in a murder. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)文淑召开记者会，坚称自己跟18年前黄金城市负责人的失踪案没有关系，并宣布接受大法院院长候选人的提名。其后，文淑被一名死囚的父亲攻击，当场头破血流。文淑被袭击的新闻掩盖18年前照片的事件。本来是加害者的文淑突然变成了受害者。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Many volunteers leave their comfort zones for unfamiliar territory. They seek to improve the lives of others, not knowing their lives will be changed too. What challenges do they face, and are they psychologically prepared? (重)为了改善别人的生活，许多义工不惜从舒适圈出走，去到陌生、落后的国度。很多人都没有想到，在改变别人以前，他们首先改变了自己的人生。当踌躇满志的义工踏上柬埔寨这片千疮百孔的土地传递温暖的时候，做了什么心理准备？又面对了什么挑战？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Why do people from the East eat tofu but the people from the West do not? Cheese is only loved by Eurasian, Han people in the past did not eat cheese? This episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak discuss on the history, production and ways of eating various cheese from the west and tofu from the east. (重)这集的节目主题是乳酪和豆腐。为什么东方人吃豆腐，而西方人没有吃豆腐的习惯？乳酪只有欧亚人喜欢，以往的汉人不吃乳酪？郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍不同种类的西方乳酪和东方豆腐的历史，制作和吃法。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) JY Group and Xun Design bid for the same project again. Zhexiong is unhappy and issue a challenge to Xuncai. If JY Group loses the project, he will have to apologise to Xuncai for the sabotage earlier. If Xun Design were to be unsuccessful in the bid, he will have to work for Zhexiong. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)JY集团和勋设计又同时竞标同一个项目。哲雄很不满，向勋才发出挑战。如果哲雄竞标失败，就必须为之前耍手段一事向勋才道歉。如果勋才失败，就得到哲雄的公司工作。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) A junior is eyeing on Nali's weather forecast presenter post. She purposely offers Nali barbecued meat, coaxes Nali to consume alcohol and soils Nali's clothes before the seven o'clock news starts so that Nali cannot host the program. Zhengyuan keeps thinking of Nali, who sat beside him on the flight to Bangkok. He goes to the TV station to look for her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)一位后辈觊觎娜丽气象预报员的位置，故意在七点开播前请娜丽吃烤肉和劝表娜丽喝酒，并故意弄脏娜丽的衣服，让她不能主持节目。正元总是想起那飞往曼谷的飞机上坐在身边的气象预报员娜丽，为了再见到她，他去电视台找她。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 73
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is arrested by the Police for kidnapping Zhuhao but the latter assures the Police that Zhiyuan is innocent. Zhuhao tells Ruli that she is only his adopted daughter. Zhiyuan feels ashamed to acknowledge Ruli. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)因涉嫌绑架及软禁柱浩之罪，智媛被警方逮捕，但柱浩向警方否认智媛之罪。柱浩跟如莉坦言她是被领养而智媛觉得自己没资格认回如莉。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 74
programme.desc: Zhiyuan overheard Haizhu and Wulie planning to thwarts Daozhi's project, so she secretly helped Daozhi. Haizhu frames Ruli by setting fire to the garment factory. Zhiyuan saves Ruli but Ruli names Zhiyuan as the arsonist during the police interrogation. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛听到海珠与武烈将要破坏道治计划，便暗中帮忙道治。海珠陷害如莉纵火工厂。智媛救出如莉却被她指证纵火嫌疑者。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 3
programme.desc: A total of 15,000 cases of missing children and teenagers have been reported in Malaysia in the last 8 years. In this episode, we delve into the stories of one father searching for his missing son and a family trying to uncover the truths behind the disappearance of their father 人生最痛，莫过于生离死别。马来西亚人口失踪问题严重，单单儿童青少年失踪案，8年来就接获1万5千宗投报。不论是主动或被动失踪，都已经敲响了国家安全的警钟。这些人失踪背后的真相，到底是什么？.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 17
programme.desc: Shangbi realises that it must be Wenshu who sent him the journal previously. Her aim is to make use of him to get rid of those who know her secrets. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼终于明白是文淑把笔记本寄给他，把他引到绮城去的。文淑的目的是要利用尚弼帮她除掉知道她把柄的人，借刀杀人。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 74
programme.desc: (R) Zhiyuan overheard Haizhu and Wulie planning to thwarts Daozhi's project, so she secretly helped Daozhi. Haizhu frames Ruli by setting fire to the garment factory. Zhiyuan saves Ruli but Ruli names Zhiyuan as the arsonist during the police interrogation. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智媛听到海珠与武烈将要破坏道治计划，便暗中帮忙道治。海珠陷害如莉纵火工厂。智媛救出如莉却被她指证纵火嫌疑者。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Dan, Mie and Juliana are avid cyclists who met on Cavenagh Bridge and became buddies. Dan fell in love at first sight with Juliana, Mie holds a torch for Dan, and Juliana flirts with Mie all the time. One day, Dan challenged Juliana to a race, and the loser must agree to one request from the winner. Mie suddenly disappeared before the race, and resurfaced with a brand new look after the race, which throws this threesome into a new form of love triangle... Online influencer Lin Lin is always coming up with new and exciting videos to boost her popularity and to earn views, sometimes doing too controversial acts for her own good. One day she was doing a live video at Cavenagh Bridge and was caught and questioned by the police for suspicious behaviour, when a huge fan of her, Nick, came to her rescue. Nick was super excited to see her and both of them clicked immediately. Just when Lin Lin thought she found a potential boyfriend, she was knocked out and found herself waking up in (PG-些许性相关语)(重)阿丹和小米、茱莲娜因为骑车在桥上相遇，很快成为无所不谈的朋友。阿丹对茱莲娜一见钟情，小米对阿丹刻骨铭心，茱莲娜却和小米暧昧不断。有一天，阿丹决定约茱莲娜比赛，只要谁赢了，就能要求对方做一件事情。小米却在比赛前就人间蒸发，等到比赛完毕后，才以全新的姿态出现，把三角关系“复杂明朗化”…… 城中网红琳琳为了维持网络上的知名度和点击率，不断出奇制胜。这一天来到加纹纳桥直播，引来警察的盘问，幸好粉丝尼克途经帮忙解围。超级粉丝和偶像见面本来也是相当兴奋，可是两个年轻人一打开话匣子竟然从早上聊到晚上，犹如相逢恨晚。就在琳琳以为竟然遇上值得发展的男性朋友的时候，她忽然晕倒！等她悠悠醒来的时候，发现自己就躺在尼克的床上，而尼克竟然就是电影里经常描写的那种“疯狂"粉丝…….

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Shanyu is upset that Zhen-ai has been accused of leaking confidential information and goes to have a talk with Yingshan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)珊玉不舍真爱被怀疑泄漏机密，拿着真爱多日来准备的资料到总公司去，跟英善担保真爱绝对不会做出对公司不利的事。英善其实很相信真爱的为人，但监察组却在真爱的电子邮箱内发现两封与竞争公司员工往来的电子邮件。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 4

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 75
programme.desc: Ruli is arrested when her scarf is found at the fire gutted factory. Zhuhao reveals to Ruli that Zhiyuan is her biological mother but Ruli declares she will not acknowledge her. programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 76
programme.desc: Zhiyuan hands the lighter to the Police when Haizhu shows no remorse for her wrongdoing. Haizhu runs away from the Police. Daozhi realizes that Zhiyuan is the one who saved Ruli in the fire. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)看到海珠没悔改态度，智媛将打火机交给警察。但警察要逮捕海珠时，她立刻逃跑。道治发现把如莉救出火灾竟是智媛。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 巾帼女将 Women Warriors - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Paige befriends Kiron, a much respected female bouncer in Chandigarh. She passionately believes that her role is critical, in keeping the female patrons safe, when they are clubbing. Kiron invites Paige home and shares why she is so grateful for the chance to helm this job. (重)巾帼女将是一个表扬21世纪女性的节目。这系列一一列出所有有关女性种种美妙和美好的一面，从受访者轻松女性化的追逐到激烈行为的工作经历。每一集，绮慧将了解在地受访者以什么工作谋生。同时，在激烈的工作和训练中，她也了解受访者如何享受社交和家庭生活。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Nadia decides to quit her job and take a trip overseas. Mei Qi wants to celebrate for her and invites Aidan to the house for a meal. She purposely makes out with him and Nadia is heartbroken and cries. Mei Qi intends to keep Nadia in Singapore and lies to Shi Jie that Nadia no longer wants to quit. Nadia loses her memory and goes back to work the next day. Aidan discovers an entry in his calendar about Nadia's last working day and sending her off at the airport. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)Nadia辞职要出国度假，美琪为她庆祝，邀请Aidan到家，故意和他亲热，让Nadia难受落泪。美琪要让Nadia留在新加坡，骗施姐Nadia不辞职了。Nadia失忆般重新回去上班。Aidan却发现他的日历里有Nadia辞职，和送她飞机的记录。Aidan好像人格分裂那样，对美琪无法自拔地爱着，另一方面又感觉是有蹊跷。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) A total of 15,000 cases of missing children and teenagers have been reported in Malaysia in the last 8 years. programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Food Notes ventures into the world of wagyu beef. Find out what shocking revelation lies ahead as we travel to Kobe in search of their renowned beef! What goes into producing the finest cattle? What is the best way to savour the delicacy? By the way, do you know Kobe beef has a rival in Japan? (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 59

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 60

(重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) From noodle staples to vegetable stir-fries, roasted chicken to deep fried prawn rolls - casual Chinese eateries known as zi char restaurants can be found all over Singapore. Check in on their specialities as we visit the best-loved zi char places this week. (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak explores on matcha production in Uji, Japan and cultivation and harvest of tea leaves in Nangang, Taipei. He and Cui Fang also fly to Australia and South Korea respectively to learn how local farmers mix technology and nature to cultivate good quality strawberries and peaches. (重)在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往日本宇治一探抹茶的制作，到台北南港了解茶叶的种植和采收。Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往澳大利亚和韩国，了解当地果农如何借由科技结合自然培育出优质草莓和水蜜桃。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) With around 8 million bikes plying the streets, traffic fatalities are the main cause of death in Ho Chi Minh City. Danny Yeo stakes out at Cho Ray Hospital's emergency unit to witness the hard work and heartbreak that takes place round the clock - all due to a moment of recklessness on the roads. (重)越南是公路意外高发国，每年夺走8000多条人命。主持人杨君伟在胡志明市体验800万辆电单车在道路上横冲直撞的险象环生，并亲往医院急诊室，看医护人员如何分秒必争抢救车祸伤者。一时不慎，代价惨重。.

programme.desc: (R) Haixiu transfers the children to other schools. Yuzhen hopes that Junjiu will know of Haixiu's whereabouts, but Haixiu has not contacted Junjiu.
